locations.name: Albany
locations.description: Food pantry operated by Metropolitan Baptist Church. Guests can visit twice a month, Walk ins welcome. wait upstairs in sanctuary, then downstairs in groups no larger than 3

locations.name: Albany
locations.description: Food pantry operated by Mater Christi Church. Updated proof of address is required every 4 months. Will serve emergency bags by appointment. The pantry is not open on any 5th Monday of the month. On Monday holidays, the pantry day is moved to the next day (Tuesday). Guests can visit twice a month Walk in welcome. Client choice

locations.description: Food pantry where guests can visit twice a month with client choice options

locations.description: Food Pantry

locations.description: Food pantry operated by Sacred Heart of Jesus Church providing food assistance and community meals

locations.description: Guests can visit once a month. walk in. Pre-packed with the exception of meat, dairy products and produce

locations.name: Ballston Spa
locations.description: Food pantry serving Saratoga County. Guests can use pantry 2 times a month. Orders placed by phone or online with scheduled delivery dates. Walk-ins accepted.

locations.name: Clifton Park
locations.description: Guest MUST call ahead of time and leave a voicemail; pantry will return the call to schedule an appointment. Guest can visit once a month. Call ahead for appt, wait inside and order is brought out. Prepack

locations.name: Cohoes
locations.description: Food pantry operated by Holy Trinity Parish Church serving residents of Cohoes and Watervliet. Clients come every 30 days for food and must call ahead. Must provide proof of residency for new applicants.

locations.name: Cropseyville
locations.org: Grafton Food Pantry at Our Lady of Snow
locations.description: Food pantry operated by Our Lady of Snow church serving the Grafton area. We recommend calling to confirm hours: Julie (518) 421-5070 or Gloria (518) 892-6722

locations.name: Delanson
locations.description: Church organization operating a food pantry providing emergency food assistance to residents of Duanesburg, Delanson, Rotterdam, Quaker Street, Esperance, Mariaville, and Schoharie areas.

locations.name: Duanesburg
locations.description: Food pantry operated by Lighthouse Evangelical Free Church. By appointment only.

locations.description: Food pantry that serves guests once a month. Bags carried to cars while guests wait outside.

locations.description: Community services organization operating the Greater Galway Food Pantry

locations.description: Food pantry providing food assistance services

locations.description: Green Island residents only, no more delivery

locations.description: Greenfield residents only, walk ins welcome. Guests can visit 2x per month.

locations.description: Food pantry providing food assistance to community members. Can visit once a month. No appointment necessary. Offers curbside pickup or delivery based on client choice.

locations.name: Hadley
locations.description: Food pantry operated by the Town of Day, providing food assistance to the community.

locations.name: Hoosick Falls
locations.description: Guest can utilize pantry 2x per month. Walk ins. Limited guests in building pre-pack with guest selection sheet

locations.name: Loudonville
locations.description: Food pantry offering dry and canned goods, personal care items and toilet paper. Available items include cereal, canned meats, pasta, and various canned foods. Does not provide gift cards or perishable food items.

locations.description: Community services center providing food pantry services with client choice model

locations.name: Nassau
locations.description: Food pantry serving guests twice or more dependent on needs. No appointment necessary.

locations.description: NYC Emergency Food Assistance Program (EFAP) location in HOPE EMPOWERMENT AND DEVELOPMENT ZONE FOOD PANTRY

locations.description: Food pantry operated by Faith & Love Fellowship. Also has a food giveaway the 1st Saturday of the month for those who cannot come during the week.

locations.description: Guests can visit twice a month online order and walk ins., client choice

locations.description: Food Pantry operated by Salvation Army

locations.description: Food pantry providing food assistance services

locations.description: Food pantry operated by Grace and Mercy Church of God in Christ. Call to verify hours of operation and to see if an appointment is required.

locations.description: Food pantry providing food assistance services

locations.name: Schenectady
locations.description: Walk-in, no appointment needed, serves 25 households per day. Call to verify hours of operation. Client choice, guests can visit every 21 days

locations.name: Schuylerville
locations.org: S.A.F.E.R. (Schuylerville Area Food and Emergency Relief)
locations.description: Food pantry providing emergency food relief to the Schuylerville area. Open year round except holidays or when school is closed due to inclement weather. Walk-in service with emergency deliveries available on a case by case basis.

locations.name: South Glens Falls
locations.address: 144 Main Street, South Glens Falls, NY 12803
locations.description: Community center providing food pantry services and senior lunch programs. Thrift store open 9am-3pm. For info about Senior Lunch Program, call 518-792-6007 ext. 11.

locations.name: South Glens Falls
locations.org: Pine Knolls Alliance Church Food Pantry
locations.address: 614 Gansevoort Road, South Glens Falls, NY 12803
locations.description: Accepts everyone. Located in Potters House building not the main Church Building. First visit is walk in (bring ID), after that they are scheduled to come in every other week.

locations.name: Troy
locations.description: Community center providing food pantry services where guests can visit twice a month with walk-ins welcome, offering prepacked food with choice of meat, produce and free items.

locations.name: Troy
locations.description: Food pantry providing client choice food assistance. No appointment necessary. Wait outside in vehicle.

locations.name: Troy
locations.description: Guests can visit once a month for pantry but can come in weekly for produce. Walk ins, client choice or online.

locations.name: Troy
locations.description: Food pantry serving Troy Housing Authority

locations.name: Troy
locations.description: Food pantry serving all of Rensselaer county. Brings ID, no appointment necessary. Community meal hosted by Amazing Grace Assembly of God Wednesdays 4-6pm. Serves Watervliet and Cohoes as well.

locations.name: Troy
locations.description: Food pantry serving the Troy area. Guests can visit once a month. Call ahead for appointment, client comes in and picks own food. Limited amount of people in building.

locations.name: Valley Falls
locations.description: Food pantry providing food assistance with client choice shopping. Once a month for full order, partial order any other time with no limit. Guests enter for client choice, no restrictions.

locations.name: Voorheesville
locations.description: Food pantry providing assistance with pantry visits by appointment and home delivery available on case-by-case basis.

locations.name: Waterford
locations.description: Grace Episcopal Church Faith's Food Pantry - Guests can visit once a month but twice if emergency. Call for appointment but walk-ins accepted. People ring bell and we bring food to them.

locations.name: Waterford
locations.description: Food pantry serving Waterford residents with scheduled appointments and fresh food options. Guests call ahead to schedule appointments and give food choices, then pick up orders plus additional fresh foods. Walk-in basis available for fresh foods. Delivery available case-by-case.

locations.name: Watervliet
locations.description: Food pantry providing food assistance to the community. Procedure: Wait Outside food will be brought out to vehicles

locations.name: Watervliet
locations.description: Food pantry serving the Capital District area. Stay outside, food will be brought to you

locations.name: Watervliet
locations.description: Food pantry operated by Redemption Church of Christ Watervliet. Hot Meals: Tuesdays 4:00 pm-6:00 pm. Will serve emergency basis when pantry is closed. Guest can visit twice a month Drive through registration, drive through pick up, prepacked

locations.description: Walk ins welcome

locations.description: Food pantry providing client choice from menu. Guests can visit once a month. Call ahead, come inside and pick up.
